  • public class Article
extends Reference
    Project: SE1021-031_Labs Assignment Name: Keeping our Sources Straight Description: an extension of Reference that caters to articles in a journal Objectives: to follow a UML diagram and utilize inheritance Class: SE1021-031 Dennis Lab: 2 FHT VERSION: 1.3 12/01/2014
    Version:
    1.0 Created on 12/8/2014 at 2:01 PM.
    Author:
    Seth

      • Article

        public Article(java.lang.String author,
       java.lang.String title,
       int publicationYear,
       java.lang.String journal,
       int startingPage,
       int endingPage)
        the constructor for a new Article object
        Parameters:
        author - the author of the article (handled by the super class)
        title - the title of the article (handled by the super class)
        publicationYear - the year of publication of the article (handled by the super class)
        journal - the name of the journal or publication which the article can be found
        startingPage - the first page of the sited article
        endingPage - the last page of the sited article
